summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3505 for the improvement of 39th Avenue North, from McGilvra Boulevard, north of East Mercer Street, to Stixrud Drive; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43422, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
